title: Understanding CEC
text: The CEC stands for the Council for Exceptional Children. It is an organization that focuses on improving the educational success of individuals with disabilities and/or gifts and talents.

title: CEC's Role
text: The CEC provides a set of standards that guide educators in teaching students with disabilities. These standards include ethical guidelines, best practices, and professional standards.

hintAnswer: standards which encompass a wide range of ethics, standards, and practices created to help guide those who have taken on the crucial role of educating students with disabilities
title: Identifying the Correct Answer
text: Which of the following best describes the CEC?
choices: council for the accreditation of educator preparation,designed to improve the quality and effectiveness of not only new instructional practitioners, but also the $$evidence-based$$ used to assess those qualities in the classroom
standards which encompass a wide range of ethics, standards, and practices created to help guide those who have taken on the crucial role of educating students with disabilities
recommended practices designed to help improve the learning outcomes of young children who have or who are $$at-risk$$ for developmental delays or disabilities
